bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.block

Class TexturedBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.BaseEntity
      • bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.block.BlockEntity
        • bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.block.TexturedBlock

  • public class TexturedBlock
extends BlockEntity
    The basic textured block in the game. You either give it an animation or an image to draw. Whichever one is set will be one that it uses to draw. If there is both an image and an animation, it will draw with the animation. If there is no image nor animation, it will draw a block with a black border and dark gray center.

             float x,

        Create a TexturedBlock object, a subclass of BlockEntity. The block has no animation or image.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent of the block
        x - The block's x position
        y - The block's y position
        width - The block's width

        public void setImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi)
        Set the image for this block. The block's texture will become the given image as a repeating tiled texture.
        Parameters:
        bi - The image that will become the texture of this image.
